TopicTitle: Command module faces the wrong way.

Articles.Content:
MechJeb version 2.5.8 (the only mod I have)

KSP Version 1.1.3 (Have not upgraded so I can use MechJeb.)

W 8.1, GTX 1080, 16 GB Memory (Still plenty of crashing with a large rocket. Go figure.)

Anyway, the moment I hook up MechJeb I get a build warning (orange triangle), "Command module faces the wrong way." Of course the warning goes away the moment I disconnect MechJeb. It matters not where I place MechJeb either.

Hello.

First, if you want to use 1.2.1 and Mechjeb, you have to use the latest dev build which can be found here.

Second, concerning you crashes with 16GB of RAM, are using the x64 version or KSP or still the old 32bits?

Third, can you post a picture with the said pod facing the wrong direction? It shouldn't be the case.

Lastly, you are not obliged to use the Mechjeb pod. You can use a patch that will enable all mechjeb functionalities on all stock pods (Don't forget Module Manager)
